org.argus.sms.app.model

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.argus.sms.app.model.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Storage of the configuration data. Stored as a Singleton in the application Created by Olivier Goutet. Openium 2014
